positions.title: Chief Executive Officer, LiGHT
positions.description_html:
LiGHT is the Expansion Initiative of GYWS (India's one of the largest student run NGO) which aims to build a network of autonomous student-run centers across India

Currently, LiGHT has its reach in 15+ cities with a network of 300+ college students across India

To learn more about my experience: https://medium.com/@akashagrwal783/how-working-in-the-social-space-transformed-my-life-ba2e51d22bc5

positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: • Led a team of 40+ Executive Members to manage the operations of 4 LiGHT Centers having 100+ members across the nation• Conducted 24+ social activities, engaged with 35+ schools/orphanages, and implemented the first fundraising drive in which 60k+ was successfully raised by LiGHT Centers• Organized the first edition of Samavesh (Annual Meet of LiGHT) which had a participation of 150+ members from different centers
positions.title: Human Resource and Network Management Head, LiGHT

• Led a team of 40+ Executive Members to manage the operations of 4 LiGHT Centers having 100+ members across the nation

positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: • Mentored a team of 25 freshmen and was responsible for their grooming, led them to expand the LiGHT network to various colleges in different parts of the country.• Represented GYWS in an annual NGO meet “Manthan” and came first in the Case Study Competition among 10+ other NGOs.• Coordinated in “Adhhyayan: The Socio-Innovation Case Challenge 2021” to bring sponsors, participants, invited judges & guest speakers, which had a participation of 800+ college students• Developed social strategies and action plans for events based on “Quality Education” like the Career Counseling Program and RISE Workshop for 10+ LiGHT Centers impacting 1000+ beneficiaries across the nation

honors_and_awards.title: National Winner of the CFA Institute Research Challenge hosted by CFA Society India 2024
honors_and_awards.description: The CFA Institute Research Challenge is an annual global competition popularly known as "the Investment Olympics" that provides students with hands-on experience in equity research, valuation, report writing and presenting their recommendations. I led a team of 5 to prepare a comprehensive sell-side initiating coverage report on JSW Energy. Our team then took our findings before a panel of industry experts to present and defend our recommendation.
